title: Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin return to discuss Kevin Durant's trade request and why returning to the Warriors is a realistic possibility. He believes USC and UCLA joining the BIG 10 was a no brainer and something we should have seen coming several years ago. He also tells you why he was right about Russell Westbrook and wrong about Zion Williamson. Plus, NBA insider Ric Bucher joins the show to give his insight on Kyrie Irving potentially getting trade to LeBron James and the Lakers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
